house_listing.house_description: Bank owned. Single family residence with a two car garage detached sold in as-is condition. Spacious rear yard. Near middle schools and shopping. Please fax all offers with prequal to listing agent at310-377-5139. Co-listed with tammy faecher. Lockbox combo l-b-m. Go, show & sell!!!!!!!!!!!!!
